rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Proficiency[/i] – Whenever this creature becomes a target of an activated ability you control, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Each ability source triggers this only once each turn.

OG_1:
Vigilance
Creatures you control have
“Proficiency — Whenever this creature becomes a target of an activated ability you control, you may pay 1 life. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Each ability source triggers this only once each turn.”
